version_description:
· Updated Avaya Equinox™ branding
· Updated and improved User Interface
· Universal app adapts to your phone or tablet device to optimize the user experience
· Top-of-Mind home screen provides at-a-glance view of upcoming meetings including tap-to-join plus recent calls and messages
· Point-to-Point Video Calling
· Voice Features including:
· Unattended Transfer
· Enhanced Call Forward
· Call Park / Unpark
· Call Pickup
· CM ad hoc audio conferences
· Exclusion
· Auto Callback
· Integrated Audio/Video/Web Conferencing
· Enhanced Auto-Configuration & Unified Login with Avaya Aura® Device Services
· Enhanced contact and directory search with Avaya Aura® Device Services
· Favorite Contacts for SIP configurations
· Avaya Aura® PPM Contacts for SIP VOIP configuration – contacts are synchronized with other clients and SIP desk phones
· SIP-based Presence
· Send-All-Calls linkage to “Do Not Disturb” presence state
· Meetings tab provides preview of calendar meetings with one-click to join/host
· Avaya Multimedia Messaging Enhancements including notification of “remote user is typing” and Microsoft Lync federation
· Security Enhancements including:
· Private trust store and certification distribution
· Allows digital certificates to be deployed via auto-configuration / settings files and to be scope-limited to Avaya Equinox™ rather than any application running on the platform
· AES-256 cipher support for encrypted media streams
· TLS version 1.2
· Enhance Hostname Validation
Bug fix. Auto login CES and AMM after upgrade.

· Bridged Line Appearance Support
· Calendar integration via Exchange Web Services
· Opus Codec
· 3D Touch Support

- CallKit Integrated Calling
- Conferencing guest and virtual room owner access with Avaya Equinox™ Conferencing 9.0.2
- Additional conference features for participants and moderators
- Client identity certificate support
- Bug fixes and user experience improvements

· Mobile Link - automatically transfer your meeting to an Avaya Equinox™ room system
· Bug fixes and user experience improvements

- Siri Support – you can ask Siri "Call contact with Equinox" / "Call my next meeting with Equinox”
- SIP Call Journaling provides 24x7 Call History
- Support for IPv6 only Cellular Data Networks including T-Mobile
- Improved workflow for ad hoc conferencing with Avaya Aura®Communication Manager
- Support for Avaya Equinox Meetings Online
- Bug fixes
French, French Canadian, Russian and Japanese EULAs

- Avaya Equinox® now works with Avaya IP Office Release 11
- Zang Spaces Team Collaboration and Direct Messaging
- Bug fixes

- Call Park / Un-Park
- Team Button
- Hunt Group Busy
- Bug fixes

• Push Notification Support
• Option to Prefer VOIP over Cellular Data
• Animated Emoji for instant messages
• Bug fixes

In addition to bug fixes, the following new features are provided:
· File Attachments for Equinox Instant Messages (Aura Environments with Multimedia Messaging)
· Avaya Custom URI – enabling actions in Equinox from other apps
· Auto Callback (Aura Environments)
· Ability to enforce TLS Version used
· User Experience Improvements for Equinox Conferencing

For Avaya Aura Environments (with Avaya Aura Device Services 8.0)

•Contact Grouping and Click to Call/Message a Group
•Directory Search by Name, Location & Department
•Single Sign On Support for Open Authorization (OAuth) & Security Assertion Mark-up Language (SAML)

For Avaya IP Office Cloud

•Single Sign on with Avaya Cloud Accounts
•VOIP Push Support

· Avaya Equinox is now called Avaya IX Workplace
· Instant Message Read & Delivery indication (Avaya Aura environments)
· Hunt Groups, Call Forwarding, Mobile Twinning (IP Office 11.0.5.1 or later - check with your system administrator for availability)
· Bug fixes

Avaya Contact Center Elite Mobile Agent Capabilities.
Support for higher resolution mobile video calling.
Instant Messaging Enhancements.

Color palette update for improved Accessibility.
Application name change to Avaya Workplace.
Option to prevent device from locking when app is on-screen.

Support for Avaya Session Manager VOIP Push Notification service.
Support Conference controls for IP Office.

OAuth/SAML login flow with Avaya Meeting Server 9.1.11
Call decline policy support

New features offered with IP Office 11.1 FP1 –
Meet Me Conference Moderator Controls.
New Adhoc Conference Modes - Drag and Drop, Add Someone to Call.
Adhoc Conference Controls.

Administrator Policy to Check/Refresh Configuration on Application Restart
Participant ID Protected Meetings for Avaya Meeting Server
iOS Meeting Room Widget
